segments.text: Excuse me ! Are you Bart Simpson from Western Electronics ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am Steven . I am here to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for meeting me at the airport , Steven .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must be tired after the long flight . Let me carry the bags for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our car is in the parking lot . We've booked a room for you . I will take you to the hotel soon . Let's go .
segments.speaker: S1
